page.title: 11RYTON BYPASS AND LOCAL PLAN
page.content: The Ryton to Crawcrook bypass has been planned for many years. The route of the bypass will be to the south of Ryton and Crawcrook. It will begin at Blaydon and will pass to the south of Stargate, Woodside and Crawcrook, rejoining the old A695 at Westburn. The bypass will be finished, hopefully, before the 1990's. Ryton Local Plan has been produced to include the bypass, housing development and proposals to protect and improve the landscape, agricukture, woodland and other natural resources and countryside. Major derelict sites will also be reclaimed.
